name: Pocket Dark Style / getpocket dark theme
description:
A dark style for pocket./ getpocket
Please leave me a comment if something is not correct

#pocket #getpocket
additional_info:
Last Update: 
06.08.2017

- all new colors - Never liked the old one. Now bit more material colors
- recolored background
- hover colors
- fixed tags


full changelog: https://github.com/J3n50m4t/getpocketDarkTheme
css: @-moz-document url-prefix("https://getpocket.com"){.pkt-nav,body,#content .wrapper.active,.side-nav,.page_queue_grid .item_content,.sub,.page_queue_list .item_content,.edit-content,.tag-detail{background-color:#212121!important;}.page_queue_grid,.item_content,.edit-content,.item-detail,.item-domain,.tag-detail{border:1px solid #313633!important;border-bottom:1px solid #313633!important}h1{color:#f0dfaf!important}h1,h2,h3,h4,h5,h6,h7{color:#E0E0E0!important}p{color:#eee!important}.reader_content,.excerpt{color:#dcdccc!important}a.queue_togglesection_option{color:#607D8B!important;}a.queue_togglesection_optionselected{color:#ECEFF1!important;}a.title{color:#42a5f5!important;}a.section-archive,a.section-favorites,a.section-mylist,a.nav-sublist,a.filter-tags{color:#607D8B!important;}a.nav-sublist:hover span{color:#ECEFF1!important}a.filter-tags:hover{color:#ECEFF1!important}a.filter-tags:hover span{color:#ECEFF1!important}li.nav-default-divider{border-bottom:1px solid #757575;}a.topic_detail,a.topic_detail:visited{color:#dcdccc!important}a:visited{color:#90A4AE!important;}div.popover-new{background-color:#212121!important;}.popover-new .popover-new-list a{color:#607D8B!important;}.popover-new .popover-new-list a:hover{color:#ECEFF1!important;background-color:#90A4AE!important}div.reading_progress_bar{background-color:#EAEAEA!important}span.nav-username{color:#607D8B!important}.item:hover .buttons{background-color:#616161!important}.overlay_screen .overlay_detail{background:#616161}.token-input-list li input{background:#616161}a.topic_detail{background-color:#757575;color:#212121!important}.item_content_actions,.item_content_text{background-color:#212121!important}.item_content_actionscontainer{border-top:1px solid #757575}}

discussions.name: Needs update, tags in list view are difficult to read
